Healing Surge

Powers with (Healing Surge) usage can be used once per day like a daily power. However, you can renew this item's power by taking a standard action to funnel your vitality into the item, spending a healing surge in the process. Spending a healing surge in this way does not restore hit points, and this standard action is separate from the action required to activate the item's power.

Published in Player's Handbook, page(s) 226.
